sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac operator
